### FP example

```
multiplyEachElementOfArray:
/* %rsi = array, %rdi length,
   %xmm0 multiplier */
loop:   test %rdi, %rdi
        je done
        movss (%rsi), %xmm1
        mulss %xmm0, %xmm1
        movss %xmm1, (%rsi)
        subq $1, %rdi
        addq $4, %rsi
        jmp loop
done:   ret
```
